headline.print_headline: Cholesterol Drugs May Cut Risk of Clots
headline.seo: Cholesterol Drug Found to Reduce Potentially Fatal Clots
headline.main: Cholesterol Drugs May Cut Risk of Clots

docs.lead_paragraph: New results from a large study suggest that the drugs known as statins may have a benefit beyond lowering cholesterol.
